name: New Harmony, Indiana
description:
January 1828

Today I arrived at New Harmony. Mr Rapp handed me the deed to the land and real estate. I am amazed at the beauty of the place. Most of its inhabitants are hardworking families with a desire to progress. I have been visiting them these days to give them everything they need to work and produce: goods, tools, money. With God's help we will make this a cooperative community, where there are no exploited workers. There is no need to make a revolution when your workers find joy in their labor.

-Robert Owen
